chbPrimaryColor.name: Custom Hotbar Primary Color:
chbPrimaryColor.nameHint: Background color for the extra hotbar added by this module. Default: #0000FF80

chbBorderColor2.name: Custom Hotbar Macro Slot Border Color:
chbBorderColor2.nameHint: Border color for the border box around each macro on the Custom Hotbar. Default: #0000FFff

chbBorderColorActive.name: Custom Hotbar Macro Highlight Color:
chbBorderColorActive.nameHint: Color of the border around a filled macro slot  on the Custom Hotbar when you hover over it with the mouse. Default: #FFFFFFff

chbBorderColorInactive.name: Primary Custom Hotbar Empty Macro Highlight Color:
chbBorderColorInactive.nameHint: Color of the border around an empty macro slot on the Custom Hotbar when you hover over it with the mouse. Default: #808080ff

chbXPos.name: Position for the custom hotbar on the X axis:
chbXPos.nameHint: Higher values are further to the right of the screen horizontally. Default: 220

chbYPos.name: Position for the custom hotbar on the Y axis:
chbYPos.nameHint: Higher values are further up the screen vertically. Default: 63

corePrimaryColor.name: Core Foundry Hotbar Primary Color:
corePrimaryColor.nameHint: Background color for the core Foundry hotbar. Default: #00000080

coreBorderColor2.name: Core Foundry Macro Slot Border Color:
coreBorderColor2.nameHint: Border color for the border box around each macro on the core Foundry hotbar. Default: #000000ff

coreBorderColorActive.name: Core Foundry Macro Highlight Color:
coreBorderColorActive.nameHint: Color of the border around a filled macro slot  on the core Foundry hotbar when you hover over it with the mouse. Default: #ff0000ff

coreBorderColorInactive.name: Core Foundry Hotbar Empty Macro Highlight Color:
coreBorderColorInactive.nameHint: Color of the border around an empty macro slot on the core Foundry hotbar when you hover over it with the mouse. Default: #ff6400ff

coreXPos.name: Position for the Core Foundry hotbar on the X axis:
coreXPos.nameHint: Higher values are further to the right of the screen horizontally. Default: 220

coreYPos.name: Position for the Core Foundry hotbar on the Y axis:
coreYPos.nameHint: Higher values are further up the screen vertically. Default: 10
